lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic recovered from a slow start as he continued the  bid to retain his world number one ranking with a 4-6 6-2 6-3 win over 14th-seeded Bulgarian Grigor Dimitrov in the Paris Masters third round on Thursday.
snippet: Novak Djokovic recovered from a slow start as he continued the  bid to retain his world number one ranking with a 4-6 6-2 6-3 win over 14th-seeded Bulgarian Grigor Dimitrov in the Paris Masters third round on Thursday....

headline.main: Djokovic and Murray Win, Cilic Books London Spot
